user_input: Please create hourly demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use Hydrogen as the carrier. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Use Germany.
author: Assistant
default_llm_context: Perform the specified PLEXOS operations based on the user's scenario and align with the requirements for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios.

tasks.description: Create hourly demand profiles by decomposing the annual energy demand figures for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios (NT, NT_HE, NT_LE) for the years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050 using Germany as the region.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Please create hourly demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios ... Use Germany.', select the most appropriate object from the following list.

function_args.user_input: Create hourly demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios with scenarios NT, NT_HE and NT_LE for years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050 using Germany as the region.

tasks.description: Add a new energy carrier object for Hydrogen using the new_carrier_pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the most appropriate energy carrier object context for Hydrogen.

tasks.description: Split the nodes of the model as specified.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the most appropriate nodes to split from the model.
